name: Turret Operator
description:
You are the last stable robot in the factory, and all your ex-comrades are out to destroy this facility.

It is up to you to defend the control panel using nothing but your wrench and 2 busted turrets that are constantly malfunctioning.

It is up to you to balance being in control of your broken weaponry and getting your turrets upgrades, repairs, and ammo. 

WASD -> Move

E -> Go in and out of control (while near control panel)

Left Mouse Button -> Shoot

P -> mute/unmute music

Hit turrets to repair them.

Collect damage powerups to upgrade damage.

Kill all the enemies before they destroy the control panel!

Art: Mason Pashkow

Sound + Programming: Evan Samuel (Heurlectic Studios)
